## indexedDBLocalPersistence variable

An implementation of [Persistence](./auth-types.persistence.md) of type 'LOCAL' using `indexedDB` for the underlying storage.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
indexedDBLocalPersistence: externs.Persistence
```
